name: id
type: Type: String (cast from an integer, but not guaranteed to be a number)
description: Description: The ID of the Filter in the database.

name: title
description: Description: A title given by the user to name the filter.

name: context
description: Description: The contexts in which the filter should be applied.

name: expires_at
type: Type: NULLABLE String (ISO 8601 Datetime), or null if the filter does not expire
description: Description: When the filter should no longer be applied.

name: filter_action
description: Description: The action to be taken when a status matches this filter.

name: keywords
description: Description: The keywords grouped under this filter.

name: statuses
description: Description: The statuses grouped under this filter.
